coded_answer.p: I am writtingwriting this letter because I am very dissapointeddisappointed with your musical show. I recently went to London on vacation, with some friends. We were told that this was a great show, and we decided to see how it was. If the show was as good as we were told we should save our final night for it, this was going to be the end of our vacation, a great one, by the way.
When our final day arrived, we went shopingshopping in the morning and then we went to the hotel to change our clothes and get ready for the show.

When we arrived, thethere were a lot of people, the paceplace was beatifulbeautiful, all seemed perfect. When we entranceenterentered the place our problems begunbegan. First, there were no discountdiscounts on the tickets but that was fine. Then, the show had a great delay, almost an hour,; we dealdealt with that too. After that they changed the principal actor, the one that replaced him was very bad, that made us realyreally angry. But that isn't all, to complete this tragedy the restaurant was closed.
I hope that you understand thatwhy I want my money back, or at least some of it, because this weren'twasn't my "perfect evening out"

How has modenmodern technology changed my daily life? I think that technology havehas changechanged my life and everybodieseverybodyeverybody's life in many ways. Nowadays, technology is everywhere, all over your house, your school, oficeoffice or any place you can be in a city. This technology has helphelped to mademake my life easier and more exciting, but like everithingeverything it has had some negative thingaspectaspects.
This technology has helphelped in many fields, like medicine, entreteinmententertainment, work and other thingthings, so it has obviuslyobviously changechanged the lifelives of many people.
The bad thingsconsequences that this could have are unimportanunimportant, in comperisoncomparison with all the good things thisit havehas done, so let's don'tnot focus on the negative aspects of it.

I think technology has become a part of our lifeslives, so we have to learn how to live in this new world, thatwhich is changing as fast as computers change. This is a new era, an era for a new tipetype of people, the feutafuture people
